nodes.bodyText:
We should disband from unquantified phrases "simple" or "easy-to-use." To Amazon-ify such statements, we could corroborate the in terms of # of steps to get started -- or # of lines of code to get started, etc. The user can then decide for themselves whether or not it is easy (hopefully.)

nodes.bodyText: Should we instead include a note about setting up Auth, before API and DataStore will work? It could still be a worthwhile call out. The use of a disparate library to do auth was a surprise in preview. The need to use Auth is less of a surprise, but still not immediately obvious to a new comer, I'd suppose.
